items.title: User Activity Tracking
items.description: Enable users to log and track workouts, steps, and calories burned via the mobile app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start, pause, and stop workout sessions
Steps and calories are automatically calculated and displayed daily
Workout history is viewable for at least the past 30 days
non_functional: Data accuracy within ±5% for steps and calories
App response time under 2 seconds for activity logging

items.title: Social Sharing
items.description: Allow users to share workout achievements and progress with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can post workout summaries to a social feed
Friends can like and comment on shared posts
Privacy settings allow users to control who sees their posts
non_functional: Feed updates within 3 seconds of posting

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about core tracking and social features. Further clarification needed on supported workout types and integration with third-party fitness devices.
